ai-patthana16.45:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.45:0.3_0: on the near and on the objects.
ai-patthana16.45:1.1_0: for the sake of reciting the teaching, not for the sake of oneself.
ai-patthana16.45:2.1_0: internally and externally, without supporting the teaching on the object, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.45:2.1_2: What is not the reason for two reasons.
